title: WTT E91C Wagner for T206 Cobb
author: dougscats

posts.post_title: WTT E91C Wagner for T206 Cobb
posts.post_content:
This SGC A, E91-C Wagner is the only chip I have to trade for a lower-grade, preferably ungraded T206 Cobb.
[I am 221 cards, with no Cobbs, into my quest of climbing the Monster.]

If your Cobb is more valuable than the Wagner, I can add money/trade other cards.

Thanks.

Doug
